ideas.headerMessage: Ka waihanga koe i te aha?
ideas.headerImageDescription: Outlandish creations from pixelated unicorns to drumbeat waveforms to levitating tacos to buckets of rainbows.
ideas.gettingStartedText: He tauhou koe ki te Scratch? Whakamātauria te akoranga Hei Tīmatanga
ideas.gettingStartedImageDescription: An illustrated boy plants his flag on top of a freshly painted mountaintop.
ideas.activityGuidesText: He aha te mea e pīrangi ana koe ki te hanga ki te Scratch? Mō ia ngohe, ka āhei koe te whakamātau i te Akoranga, tikiaketia tētahi kohinga o Ngā Kāri Ngohe, tirohia rānei te Aratohu Mā Te Kaiwhakaako.
ideas.animateANameDescription: Whakahākoritia ngā reta o tō ingoa, kārangaranga, tino kupu rānei.
ideas.animateANameImageDescription: The name ANYA in all caps and blocked letters is poised to wiggle
ideas.animateACharacterDescription: Mā te hākorikori ka puta ngā kiripuaki ki te ao mārama.
ideas.animateACharacterImageDescription: An taco with a wand, wizard cap and flowing white beard floats enchantingly in low-Earth orbit.
ideas.makeMusicDescription: Whiriwhiria he taonga pūoro, tāpirihia he oro, pēhia ngā kī hoki hei whakatangi pūoro.
ideas.makeMusicImageDescription: Strings vibrate on an illustrated Gibson explorer.
ideas.createAStoryDescription: Whiriwhiria he kiripuaki, tāpirihia he matapakinga, whakaarahia tō kōrero kia ora.
ideas.createAStoryImageDescription: A wizard beckons a traveling witch towards a distant castle.
ideas.chaseGameDescription: Waihangatia tētahi kēmu, ka whai koe i tētahi kiripuaki kia whiwhi ai i ngā piro.
ideas.chaseGameImageDescription: A happy interactive octopus passes over a star.
ideas.videoSensingDescription: Pāhekoheko i te kaupapa mā te toronga "Tairongo Ataata".
ideas.videoSensingImageDescription: A virtual hand dodges a spurt of flame in an attempt to pet a dragon.
ideas.cardsTitle: Tīkina te Kohinga Katoa o Ngā Kāri Tuhiwaehere
ideas.cardsText: Ka taea e koe te ako ki te hanga kēmu tauwhiti, kōrero tauwhiti hoki, waiata tauwhiti hoki, hākoritanga tauwhiti hoki, aha, aha, ki ngā Kāri Tuhiwaehere Scratch!
ideas.cardsIllustrationDescription: An assortment of fun, animated characters and objects leap out of a stack of cards.
ideas.starterProjectsText: Ka taea e koe te tākaro ki Ngā Kaupapa Tīmata, te whakarākei anō hoki ki te waihanga i ō ake kaupapa.
ideas.starterProjectsImageDescription: An illustration of the Scratch Code Editor.
ideas.desktopEditorBody: Hei waihanga kaupapa me te kore hononga Ipurangi, ka taea e koe te tikiake i te Scratch App.
ideas.desktopEditorBodyHTML: Hei waihanga kaupapa me te kore hononga Ipurangi, ka taea e koe te tikiake i te Scratch App.
ideas.questionsBody: He pātai anō āu? Tirohia te He Pātai Auau toro atu rānei ki te Āwhina i Ngā Huinga Hōtuhi.
ideas.questionsBodyHTML: He pātai anō āu? Tirohia te <faq>He Pātai Auau</faq> toro atu rānei ki te <forum>Āwhina i Ngā Huinga Hōtuhi</forum>.
ideas.MakeItFlyDescription: Kōwhiritia tētahi kiripuaki, ā, tukuna kia rere!
ideas.MakeItFlyImageDescription: The scratch cat flies over the skyline. Alongside a flying taco.
ideas.RaceDescription: Hangaia tētahi kēmu kia whakataetae ngā kiripuaki e rua.
ideas.HideAndSeekDescription: Hangaia tētahi kēmu taupupuni me ētahi kiripuaki ka puta mai, ka ngaro hoki.
ideas.FashionDescription: Hangaia tētahi kēmu ka kākahuria e koe tētahi kiripuaki ki ngā momo kākahu maha, taera hoki.
ideas.PongDescription: Hangaia tētahi kēmu tāwhana pōro me ngā pūoro, ngā piro hoki, pānga kē atu rānei.
ideas.PongImageDescription: A ball bounces off a digital paddle.
ideas.ImagineDescription: Pōhewatia tētahi ao, e taea ai ngā mea katoa.
ideas.ImagineImageDescription: A girl stands proudly in front of a thought bubble as big as the Earth and as intricate as butterfly wings.
ideas.DanceDescription: Hoahoaina tētahi kanikani ā-hākorikori me ngā pūoro, ngā takahanga waewae hoki.
ideas.CatchDescription: Hangaia tētahi kēmu e hopu ai koe i ngā mea e takataka iho ana i te rangi.
ideas.VirtualPetDescription: Hangaia tētahi mōkai pāhekoheko ka taea te kai, te inu hoki, te tākaro hoki
